com.shipdream.lib.poke

Interface Graph.Monitor

  • Enclosing class:
    Graph

    public static interface Graph.Monitor
    Monitor to watch when the graph is about to inject or release an object

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onInject(java.lang.Object target)
      Called when the graph is about to inject dependencies into the given object
      void onRelease(java.lang.Object target)
      Called when the graph is about to release dependencies from the given object

    • Method Detail

        Called when the graph is about to release dependencies from the given object

        target - The object to release
